name: Roadfix Rush
description:
Roadfix Rush is an addictive arcade-style game in which you will have to fix potholes by tapping or sliding your fingers on the screen to avoid cars being crashed.

Being focused and really quick movements will be necessary to achieve the highest score in world-wide leaderboards.

Game is totally free! But if you like us, you can upgrade to ad-free version of Roadfix Rush (Roadfix Rush Deluxe).

Roadfix Rush features:
- Fast and excite arcade-style gameplay will give you a lot of fun anywhere and anytime
- Easy to play hard to master
- Leaderboards for you and your friends
- Create multiple combos to get special feature
- Stunning 2d, cartoon graphics
developers: DIGITAL MELODY GAMES KITAJEWSKI I STALEWSKI SPOLKA JAWNA
publishers: DIGITAL MELODY GAMES KITAJEWSKI I STALEWSKI SPOLKA JAWNA
